Key Match Events: Tyler Herro scored 32 points to lead five Miami scorers in double figures
Bam Adebayo added 23 points, 10 assists and nine rebounds
Jaime Jaquez Jr. put up 12 points
Jimmy Butler returned from a five-game absence and finished with nine points in 25 minutes
Terry Rozier served a one-game suspension
Trey Murphy III scored 34 points – one off his season high
The Pelicans crept within 111-104 on a 3-pointer by McCollum with 2:47 left, but they didn’t get any closer
Post-Match Reflections: Herro had it all going on offense in Miami's home victory!
